channel.title: 317[PI] OfferX [help me plz]
channel.description:
Ok so im trying to add M to equal millions and K to equal thousands but everything i've tried i get 100 errors.
When i trade someone and "Offer X" i try typing in 100M but it doesnt allow me to type letters, only numbers so im stuck typing 100000000
Can someone direct me to a tutorial or some type of snippet of some sort?

item.title: 317[PI] OfferX [help me plz]
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

You will learm… Nothing, if you rip off someone, as stated above 100 errors usually means your missing a bracket.

Follow the tut you had before then post errors you’re having here.

Read full topic
